```{r}
library(block.protocol)
```

```{r fig.width = 10, fig.height = 10}
overlay <- overlay_game(
  n = 13,
  n_storage_nodes = 6,
  max_outgoing_conn = 2,
  max_total_conn = 10
)
```

```{r}
g_n <- overlay |> as_graph()
g_bl <- overlay |> as_graph(block_flow_graph = TRUE)
```

```{r}
layout <- layout_with_fr(g_n)
```

```{r fig.width = 10, fig.height = 10}
plot(g_n, 
     rescale=FALSE, 
     ylim = c(-6,6), 
     layout = layout, 
     vertex.size = 30, 
     vertex.label = NA)
```

```{r fig.width = 10, fig.height = 10}
plot(g_bl, 
     rescale=FALSE, 
     ylim = c(-6,6), 
     layout = layout, 
     vertex.size = 30, 
     vertex.label = NA)
```
